item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

26. Reinventing Core Data Development with SwiftData Principles (23 points | 7 comments)
27. Medical student's apparent celiac disease responded to giardiasis treatment (156 points | 88 comments)

29. The early days of peer review: five insights from historic reports (41 points | 24 comments)
